title: How to connect to eduroam in Linux
description: This blog post covers over how do connect to eduroam inside arch linux using iwd.
content:
How to connect to eduroam in Linux

This blog post covers over how do connect to eduroam inside arch linux using iwd.

If not already installed install iwd with:

sudo pacman -S iwd

Create eduroam config file

iwctl will not be configured automatically like the other networks, you need to create a config file.

  • Create the file 
    /var/lib/iwd/eduroam.8021x
    with : 
    mkdir -p /var/lib/iwd && touch /var/lib/iwd/eduroam.8021x
  • Add this content to it:
    [Security]
    EAP-Method=PEA
    PEAP-Identity=your_username@your_institution.edu
    EAP-PEAP-Phase2-Method=MSCHAPV2
    EAP-PEAP-ServerDomainMask=your_institution.edu
    EAP-PEAP-Password=your_password
    EOL

Connect to eduroam

  • Connect to eduroam using the command: 
    iwctl station wlan0 connect eduroam
  • Verify the connection: 
    iwctl station wlan0 show
author: Antoine Geiger

title: Aliexpress items for cheap
description: How to get aliexpress products for cheap with this trick
content:
Aliexpress items for cheap

When creating a new account on Aliexpress you have a big discount on the first item you buy, this post is basically a guide on how to create lots of accounts without getting banned.

Signing up

When you sign up on Aliexpress you are asked for an email and a password or something like a google account. Using a google account is safer in the way that your payment is more likely to go through. However, I have found an easy workaround: disposable email services (e.g. mailinator) On these types of services it is possible to create an email address without a password, by just typing it it.

Paying

It is important that you do not use the same payment method more than 2-3 times in the same month. The same goes with the address of delivery but here it needs to be different every time. Now, instead of changing the whole address you can simply change it by adding small typos, or double letters, or putting a special character that looks like the original character. It just needs to be a different string on each payment, that is all the algorithm looks for. The actual address will be read by a human, not a computer.

Note: In some countries it may seem that you cannot write small typos into the address because there is a pop up menu that autocompletes it, just ignore it, you can still write typos.
author: Antoine Geiger

title: Useful Linux commands
description: A non-exhaustive list of handy commands in linux
content:
Linux commands

This is a non-exhaustive list of handy commands in linux and vim. These are based of an Arch Linux user, if you are using another distrubution some of the commands might not work.

General commands

  • Search for the fastest mirror and append them to 
    /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist
    (mirrorlist) 
    sudo reflector --latest 20 --protocol https --sort rate --save /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist
  • Start a http server inside the working directory with python 
    python -m http.server
    It is then accessible in http://localhost:8000/
  • Scan a directory for viruses or attack signatures (using clamav) 
    sudo freshclam
     updates the virus definitions 
    clamscan -r /path/to/folder
     scans the directory
  • Copy files using rsync (fancy and faster cp) 
    rsync -avh --progress
    -a: archive mode -v: verbose -h: human readable sizes
  • Add a submodule when cloning a github repository 
    git submodule upadte --init --recursive

Vim commands

  • Delete from the cursor until the end of the line 
    D
  • Repeat the previous command 
    .
  • Recenter cursor in the middle of the screen 
    zz
  • Open file browser 
    :Ex
author: Antoine Geiger

title: Adding a ssh key to a github account
description: A short cheat sheet on how to add a ssh key to github, wihout any unnecessary info
content:
Generating a new SSH key

  • Generating a new SSH key

    If your system is relatively recent:

    ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "your_email@example.com"

    If a little older (ed25519 isn't supported):

    ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "your_email@example.com"

  • Adding SSH key to SSH agent

    Start the agent:

    eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"

    Add you key:

     ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
author: Antoine Geiger
